des: "I love that it's sweet and makes me feel like I'm getting away with having dessert for breakfast. The best part is that you can have breakfast ready in just minutes, all served up in one glass!"
ins: Place almond milk, banana, almond butter, and chia seeds in a blender. Lightly sprinkle cinnamon and nutmeg on top; blend until smooth, 10 to 15 seconds.
